nodes.text: Crêpes Malreaux were created by Fidelis for the Ninth Viscount Malreaux of Vjun. It has been warmly commended for the last eight generations.

Fidelis served it once more to Whie Malreaux and Scout aboard the Nighthawk. But instead of using Acid-beets as the customary sidedish, he was forced to make do with dried whip-smelt, cheese, Reythan crackers and a Souse-mustard tapenade for appetizers.
